name: Mini Rabbit Brooch
description:
Follow the white rabbit...

Super cute porcelain mini rabbit brooch

Clear glazed on the front , and with a nickel plated fastner on the back.

Measures : 3 cm x 3 cm

Also available as cufflinks!

name: Tealight Holder
description:
Lovely slipcast porcelain cup with pierced holes around the top half , letting the candle light shine through.

Very beautiful when lit on dark winter nights,
a must for the cosy festive season!

Approx 6cm tall

Fits a regular tea light candle.
 
OBS : The cup will get hot when the candle is lit so please handle with care.

name: Porcelain Mini Vase
description:
Cute & beautiful vase in the shape of a small milk bottle

Ideal for just a couple of flowers , or for single stems in a group

Approx 10 cm high /volume 100 ml

Handmade in Bristol by Hanne Rysgaard

Dishwasher & microwave safe

name: Cow Face Milk Bottle
description:
Add a bit of humour & MOO factor to the breakfast table , and keep your milk/cream fresh in this lovely porcelain milk bottle with a black cow face transfer on both sides.

Supplied with cork stopper

Approx size 12x7x5cm / 300 ml volume

Handmade in Bristol by Hanne Rysgaard

name: Cows Porcelain Milk Jug
description:
Genuine 'Handmade in Bristol' ceramics by Hanne Rysgaard 

Slipcast milk jug made in clear glazed porcelain , with a row of black cows walking around the form.

This lovely milk jug will bring MOO factor as well as fun & function to your dining table ,get people talking and it simply looks FAB too!

Additionally the jug is also absolutely perfect for your breakfast in bed tray on those long lazy Sundays!

Dishwasher and microwave safe.

The Jug is available in 4 different sizes/shapes

Small : 7x6x6cm (approx. 175 ml)

Medium : 14x6x6cm (approx. 350 ml)

Large : 21x6x6cm (approx. 600 ml)

Bottle : 16x5x9 (approx. 450ml)

name: Cow Face Milk Jug
description:
Genuine 'Handmade in Bristol' ceramics by Hanne Rysgaard 

Slipcast milk jug made in clear glazed porcelain with a stylish black cow portrait decoration

This lovely milk jug will bring MOO factor as well as fun & function to your dining table ,get people talking and it simply looks FAB too!

Additionally the jug is also absolutely perfect for your breakfast in bed tray on those long lazy Sundays!

Dishwasher and microwave safe.

The Jug is available in 2 different sizes

Small : 7x6x6cm ( holds approx. 175 ml)

Medium : 14x6x6cm ( holds approx. 350 ml)

name: Union Jack Butter Dish
description:
Genuine 'Handmade in Bristol' ceramics by Hanne Rysgaard

Slipcast butter dish in clear glazed porcelain with a Union Jack pattern on all 4 sides

This iconic butter dish brings both fun & function to the breakfast table , it gets people talking and also looks FAB!

Simply a GREAT way to celebrate everything British right from the start of the day!

Size: Size: 8 x 11 x 15cm (approx volume 350ml)

The porcelain Butter Dish is dishwasher and microwave safe.

name: Polkadot Milk Bottle
description:
Slipcast porcelain milk bottle with multicoloured polkadot decoration

The Bottle comes with a cork stopper to keep content fresh when stored in the fridge

Handmade in Bristol by Hanne Rysgaard

Size : 7x 9 x 16 cm

(approx volume 450 ml)

Dishwasher & microwave safe

name: Dimple Milk Bottle
description:
'Squishy' porcelain milk bottle with tiny polkadot transfers in the dimples.

Supplied with cork stopper to keep the content fresh in the fridge

Holds approx 300ml / height 16 cm

Handmade in Bristol by Hanne Rysgaard

name: Salt & Pepper Duck Set
description:
Salt & Pepper shaker duck, slipcast porcelain .

Add some 'quack-quack' to the dinner table and make people smile

Approx 6x4x5 cm

Supplied with plastic stopper

Handmade in Bristol by Hanne Rysgaard

name: XL Milk Jug
description:
I have a limited number of extra large milk jugs available...

I am happy to decorate them with any of the patterns that you see on my webshop:)

Please order your XL jug, and send me a separate message straight away with your chosen pattern...

XL : 8 x 8 x 20cm / approx volume 1000ml

name: Mix Posy Bone China Mug
description:
This lovely bone china mug will be a firm favorite by all lovers of the vintage floral style , mix and match it with your own crockery or start collecting a set of these beauties.

Each mug is lovingly hand decorated with a mixed line of small and medium floral posies going all the way around the mug , inside and out , thus creating an ecletic modern take on florals , and making sure no two mugs are the same so each one is truly unique.

Please be aware that due to the hand decorated nature of this product , your mug may vary slightly from the images shown here.

Slip cast bone china clay and transparent glaze with screen printed ceramic transfer decoration.

Dish washer & microwave safe.

size : H8.7cm x W9cm x D9cm

Volume : 350 ml

name: Scrabble Necklace
description:
An edition of Scrabble necklaces , handmade using original vintage Scrabble pieces from one whole set.

Spelling out fun & positive 5 letter words and sounds ...a perfect present for girls of all ages.

The 5 letter word choices on sale here are fixed , but if you would like to order a specific word or name please email me and I will send you a link to purchase it online.

name: Mixed Posy Porcelain Milk Jug
description:
The newsest take on the classic milk jug in Hanne Rysgaard's handmade porcelain collection , uniquely combining vintage & modern.

This milk jug makes for an ideal and very useful present for all those people who dislike milk served directly from the plastic container.

Look no futher for your mum's next present - she will love this one and enjoy using it every day!

Additionally the milk jug is also great for your breakfast in bed tray on those long lazy Sundays and doubles up as a vase too.

Dishwasher & microwave safe

size : H14cm x W6cm x D6cm
volume : 350 ml

name: Pimpernel Butter Dish
description:

Slipcast porcelain with a beautiful & classic cobalt blue flower chintz pattern around the dish.

Size: 8 x 11 x 15cm

Handmade in Bristol by Hanne Rysgaard

Dishwasher & microwave safe.

Anton Goldenstein & Hanne Rysgaard

name: Polkadot Cup & Saucer
description:
Due to popular demand my iconic handthrown cup now finally comes with a saucer!

Slightly lower and wider than her other cups , this one holds approx 300 ml , and sits snugly in its handthrown saucer.

For now it's only available in polkadot

But you can always email and commisson me to make you one with your choice of surface pattern?

(Check all the other products here for the different options!)

As always the cup is dishwasher and microwave safe

name: 3-Tier Cakestand
description:
3-tier porcelain cake stand with a silver coloured metal stand

Available in a variety of surface patterns.

Hand thrown in Audrey Blackman Porcelain by Hanne Rysgaard

Height : 54 cm
Width: 27 cm

Approx 10 cm high /volume 100 ml

Handmade in Bristol by Hanne Rysgaard

Available in three different surface patterns:
Butterflies , Blue delft florals or drippy gold & cherubs

name: Drippy Gold & Cherub Milk Jug
description:
Genuine 'Handmade in Bristol' ceramics by Hanne Rysgaard at blaze.

Slipcast milk jug in clear glazed porcelain with dripping gold lustre and a mix of cherub, floral & insect decorations entwining the form.

This iconic jug brings both fun & function and a touch of luxury to the breakfast table, gets people talking and it simply looks FAB too!

Each jug is hand decorated so yours may vary slightly from the images shown here, but rest assured it will be stunning!

Additionally it's also absolutely perfect for your breakfast in bed tray on those long lazy Sundays!

Size medium : 14x6x6cm (holds approx. 350ml)

Approx volume 350 ml

To preserve the gold lustre please handwash only and do NOT microwave.

name: Drippy Gold & Cherub Teapot
description:
Large slipcast porcelain Tea Pot with a kitch & fun mix of cherub/flower/insect decoration going around the shape.

Genuine handmade in Bristol ceramics by Hanne Rysgaard

Each teapot is handfinished and as such unique ,so may vary slightly from the images shown.

To preserve the gold lustre please handwash only - Do NOT microwave.

Available in 2 different sizes

name: Drippy Gold & Cherub Cup
description:
Wheel thrown porcelain cup with dripping gold lustre and a mix of cherub and floral decorations entwining the form, bringing a touch of luxury and fun to your daily life.

The unique and practical handle and the generous form, will make it your chosen favorite everytime!

Each cup is handtmade and as such unique ,so may vary slightly from the images shown.

To preserve the gold lustre please handwash only - Do NOT microwave.

Large Cup : Approx volume 450 ml

Genuine handmade in Bristol ceramics by Hanne Rysgaard

name: Large Drippy Gold Charger
description:
Stunning wheel thrown porcelain charger, decorated with a mix of floral and insect transfers , and trademark drippy gold rim.

Perfect for serving cakes and sandwiches for afternoon tea , as a fruit bowl or simply used as a beautiful decorative plate for you home.

Each plate is handdecorated and as such unique , so may vary slightly from the images shown.

Plate diameter : 45 cm

Available in 2 different finishes

To preserve the gold lustre please handwash only - Do NOT microwave.
